title: How to redownload League of Legends
body: I accidentally deleted the original LeagueOfLegendsBetaDownloader.dmg file is there any way to get the file back on to my computer?  I'm really in a pickle here.  Can anyone help me out? And is it even possible to get back on to my computer?

replies.body: It did not work, it popped up, like the part before the Userkernal actually opens to update the patches but then it shut down completely and userkernal didn't open  or anything it like force quit on me.
You should be able to install with the installer from [this link.](https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/Mac_ShellInstaller/NA/League%20of%20Legends%20NA.dmg) Let me know if this worked for you!
